EmailTemplate.description: Notifies ANZ Why Go user that their GNG has been Rejected
EmailTemplate.name: ANZ Why Go Rejection Notification - English only
EmailTemplate.subject: Notifies GNG user that GNG has been Rejected (US)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.ANZ_Approver__c}has rejected the 'Who Go' decision for {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Opportunity__c}. Click here to review the 'Why Go' application: {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Link} and any rejection comments.
